channel.title: Cybersecurity News Aggregator
channel.description: Latest cybersecurity news from top sources
channel.comment: News aggregated from: Krebs on Security, The Hacker News, Threatpost, Bleeping Computer, Dark Reading

item.title: Hackers compromise NGINX servers to redirect user traffic
item.description: A threat actor is compromising NGINX servers in a campaign that hijacks user traffic and reroutes it through the attacker's backend infrastructure. [...]...
